messages.subject: Fwd: [NHEN-SpeakOut] Homeschool Author Linda Dobson on TV Tonight
messages.messageBody:
>From: Shay Seaborne <s-seaborne@...>
>Mailing-List: list NHEN-SpeakOut@egroups.com; contact
>NHEN-SpeakOut-owner@egroups.com
>Delivered-To: mailing list NHEN-SpeakOut@egroups.com
>List-Unsubscribe: <mailto:NHEN-SpeakOut-unsubscribe@egroups.com>
>Date: Thu, 29 Jun 2000 15:39:16 -0400
>Reply-To: NHEN-SpeakOut@egroups.com
>Subject: [NHEN-SpeakOut] Homeschool Author Linda Dobson on TV Tonight
>
>
>Author Linda Dobson, whose latest book "Homeschoolers' Success Stories"
>is hot off the press, will be on "The News" with Brian Williams
>(MSNBC/CNBC) Thursday, June 29, at 9PM ET/PT. Check your local listings,
>or see the program guide http://www.cnbc.com/onlycnbc/program/grid.asp
>
>
>-Shay
>

>National Home Education Network: http://www.nhen.org
